title: Unger's Thoughts
content:
I just realized that one of my all-time favorite interviews is actually available on-line:   
   
 [http://www.eyemagazine.com/feature.php?id=4&fid=10](http://web.archive.org/web/20060525040640/http:/www.eyemagazine.com/feature.php?id=4&fid=10)   
   
Besides wanting to share that interview, I was wondering what people thought of the views and implications in the "TYPOGRAPHY AND READING" section specifically.   
   
hhp
author: hrant
